In one of my tests I start a thread that will call update() when it 
is done.  In the Update I check the results.   If an 
assert it called because something isnt correct, I get the Exception:

junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: "Message I had in the assert 
stmt."

Is there something different I need to do when I am running threads 
in my tests?

Thanks
